name: 24 Hours Emergency
description: MedRay is known for providing advanced emergency services with rapid response for any kind of treatment. We have well-equipped emergency and trauma center with facilities of international standards.

name: 24 Hours Orthopedics
description: This complex system, which includes your bones, joints, ligaments, tendons, muscles, and nerves, allows you to move, work, and be active. And anybody can break a bone.

name: 24 Hours Vascular Surgery
description: Vascular surgery is a surgical subspecialty in which diseases of the vascular system, or arteries, veins and lymphatic circulation.

name: Physiotherapy
description: Our Physiotherapists help people affected by injury, illness or disability through movement and exercise, manual therapy, education and advice.

name: ECO Cardiogram
description: During an echo test, ultrasound (high-frequency sound waves) from a hand-held wand placed on your chest provides pictures of the heart's valve.

name: ECG
description: Electrocardiography is the process of producing an electrocardiogram (ECG or EKG). It is a graph of voltage versus time of the electrical activity.

name: Color Doppler
description: Color Doppler is a method of visually detecting motion or blood flow using a color map that is incorporated into a standard B-mode image. The principles of color Doppler are similar to those of pulsed-wave Doppler.

name: Digital X-Ray
description: A digital X-ray, or digital radiography, is a modern type of X-ray that utilises digital sensors instead of photographic film, as with a traditional X-ray.

name: Ultra Sonography
description: procedure that uses high-energy sound waves to look at tissues and organs inside the body. The sound waves make echoes that form pictures of the tissues and organs on a computer screen (sonogram).

name: C-Arm OT
description: MedRay offers a luxurious quality C-Arm Compatible Hydraulic OT table with the best results. It has so many variants like Manual OT Table.

name: Digital Lab
description: We Have Digital X-ray with Computed Radiography, Mammography, OPG, Deltal X-ray, ECG, Channel, Spirometry, Laryngoscope, Spirometry.

name: Post Operative Ward
description: We Provide Postoperative care is the care you receive after a surgical procedure. The type of postoperative care you need depends on the type of surgery you have.

name: AC/ Non AC Cabin
description: We provide both AC and Non AC Cabin with fresh environment so that you get well soon. And it's really very cool.

name: 24 Hours Ambulance Service
description: We Provide Emergency Ambulance Service so that you can take it easily, fastly.
